007package renderer.pipeline;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013
014/**
015   Transform each {@link Vertex} of a {@link Model} from the model's
016   (private) local coordinate system to the (shared) world coordinate
017   system.
018<p>
019   For each {@code Vertex} object in a {@code Model} object, use the
020   current model-to-world transformation {@link Matrix} to transform
021   the object's {@code Vertex} coordinates from a model's coordinate
022   system to the world coordinate system.
023<p>
024   Return a new {@code Model} object, which contains all the translated
025   vertices from the original model, to the renderer. The original model
026   object, which belongs to the client program, remains unchanged. So the
027   renderer gets the mutated model and the client sees its model as being
028   preserved.
029*/
030public class Model2World
031{
032   /**
033      Use the current model-to-world transformation {@link Matrix} to
034      transform each {@link Vertex} from a {@link Model}'s coordinate
035      system to the world coordinate system.
036
037      @param model   {@link Model} with {@link Vertex} objects in model coordinate
038      @param ctm     the current model-to-world transformation {@link Matrix}
039      @return a new {@link Model} with {@link Vertex} objects in the world coordinate system
040   */
041   public static Model model2world(final Model model,
042                                   final Matrix ctm)
043   {
044      // A new vertex list to hold the transformed vertices.
045      final List<Vertex> newVertexList =
046                            new ArrayList<>(model.vertexList.size());
047
048      // Replace each Vertex object with one that
049      // contains world coordinates.
050      for (final Vertex v : model.vertexList)
051      {
052         newVertexList.add( ctm.times(v) );
053      }
054
055      // Return to the renderer an updated model.
056      return new Model(newVertexList,
057                       model.primitiveList,
058                       model.colorList,
059                       model.name,
060                       model.getMatrix(),
061                       model.nestedModels,
062                       model.textureList,
063                       model.texCoordList,
064                       model.visible,
065                       model.doBackFaceCulling,
066                       model.frontFacingIsCCW,
067                       model.facesHaveTwoSides);
068   }
069
070
071
072   // Private default constructor to enforce noninstantiable class.
073   // See Item 4 in "Effective Java", 3rd Ed, Joshua Bloch.
074   private Model2World() {
075      throw new AssertionError();
076   }
077}
